summary: At a rail crossing, a small fender-bender incident turns into a major tit-for-tat retaliatory war among various motorists.
cast: Stan Laurel|Oliver Hardy|Edgar Kennedy|Thelma Hill|Ruby Blaine|Harry Bernard|Chet Brandenburg|Baldwin Cooke|Edgar Dearing|Frank Ellis|Helen Gilmore|Clara Guiol|Charlie Hall|Jack Hill|Fred Holmes|Ham Kinsey|Sam Lufkin|Charles McMurphy|Retta Palmer|Lon Poff|Thomas Benton Roberts|Charley Rogers|George Rowe|Lyle Tayo|Dorothea Wolbert
keywords: tit for tat|traffic jam|sailor|boys and girls|schadenfreude
title: Two Tars
